text: (minisune! apage) rasul tama deviyangen tamanta pahala karana lada (dharmaya) ættenma visvasa karanneya. (esema anit) visvasavantayinda (visvasa karannaha. movun) siyallanma allahvada, ohuge malayikavarunvada, ohuge dharmayanda, ohuge nabivarunvada, visvasa karannaha. tavada “ohuge nabivarunge kisivekut (nabivarun nova yayi) api ven kara (pratiksepa kara) noharinnemu”. tavada “(deviyane! obage dharma ayavan) api savan dunnemu! (obage niyogayanta) api avanata vunemu! apage deviyane! api obage samava æyada sitinnemu! oba vetama (api) sendu viya yutuva ættemu” yayi pavasannaha
